Question: There are grapes near a wine glass in each image.

Reference Answer: False

Original program:

```
The statement is True.
```
Program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE,question="Is 'There are grapes near a wine glass in each image.' true or false?")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='Is 'There are grapes near a wine glass in each image.' true or false?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>true</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>true</span></b></div><hr>
